memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 1 items in this auction, with a total profit of $800.:
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $7500.:
  * Won Mechanism J at $4500 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Unit Q at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $5700.:
  * Won Appliance O at $4500 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Implement G at $3800 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 5 items in this auction, with a total profit of $10000.:
  * Won Machine P at $7000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Doodad D at $2700 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Gizmo F at $2800 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Gadget B at $1500 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
